about_me:
Welcome to my page!


If you are wondering if I am the right fit as your next employee or contractor, the answer is 'yes'!


However, if you are not convinced by my bold statement above, that is exactly what this page is for.


Here you will find all the relevant links, and you also have a nice page to bookmark.


Now a bit about me (assuming you are here to know more about me).


I am a {{age}} year old Cloud Engineer with a strong background in Software Engineering since 2017 (a solid {{years_of_development}} years!). My tech stack mostly revolves around TypeScript, but I am also fluent in PHP. That being said, I am also proficient in other languages like Python, and I am currently learning Rust and Go to improve across the entire stack. As you can see, my main set of skills are tailored for Web & Cloud, but this is not limiting.


On the Cloud & DevOps side of things, I am experienced in using AWS together with Terraform and CDK to provision the likes of Lambdas, Step Functions & ECS. Across development, staging and production, I am also knowledgeable in the setups using both Docker and Docker Compose to create a reproducible environment for easy deployment with CI/CD.


I have experience working both with Monoliths and Micro-services, and refactoring between the two has been my task more than once. In the past, I have had the pleasure of leading a project where refactoring and optimizing an entire codebase was on the table, and being the lead of such a project taught me many lessons.


But enough about me for now. If you are interested in getting to know me better or you would like to have me work on your next project, give me a ping using the email below.
